data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Rubin Kazan drive upfield and Oleg Danchenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tambow defender.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Tambow.
Vladimir Obukhov of Tambow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tambow have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Eskov.
Tambow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Tambow push forward at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium and Georgi Melkadze gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rubin Kazan defence.
Aleksei Eskov awards the away team a throw-in.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Eskov.
Darko Jevtic for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Tambow have a goal kick.
Georgi Melkadze gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tambow.
Corner awarded to Tambow.
Throw-in for Tambow close to the penalty box.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Aleksei Eskov.
Aleksei Eskov signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Tambow's half.
Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ivan Ignatyev's header is off-target for Rubin Kazan.
Aleksei Eskov awards Tambow a goal kick.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tambow's Georgi Melkadze gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Corner awarded to Tambow.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambow goal kick.
Throw-in for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Tambow's Vladimir Obukhov gets in a shot on goal at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Aleksei Eskov signals a free kick to Tambow in their own half.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Can Tambow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Aleksei Eskov signals a throw-in for Tambow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Oliver Abildgaard (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Rubin Kazan's Oliver Abildgaard misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Throw-in for Tambow in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tambow have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Tambow in Nizhny Novgorod.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Aleksei Eskov awards the home team a throw-in.
Tambow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Nizhny Novgorod a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambow goal kick.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Mikhail Kostyukov fires in a strike for Tambow.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rubin Kazan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tambow.
Aleksei Eskov signals a Tambow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Aleksei Eskov signals a free kick to Tambow.
Tambow's Guram Tetrashvili is on target but unsuccessful.
Tambow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tambow in their own half.
At Nizhny Novgorod Stadium, Oliver Abildgaard has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Aleksei Eskov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Can Tambow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
In Nizhny Novgorod, Georgi Melkadze of Tambow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tambow's Guram Tetrashvili gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Georgi Melkadze of Tambow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Aleksei Eskov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Tambow territory.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Important block from the Tambow defence as Darko Jevtic fires in a strike for Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan pushes forward through Vyacheslav Podberezkin, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tambow advance rapidly upfield but Aleksei Eskov blows for offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Anton Kilin.
Tambow needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Anton Kilin returns to the field for Tambow after picking up a slight injury.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adessoye Oyewole (Tambow) gets a yellow card.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambow's half?
Tambow needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Tambow.
Tambow's Guram Tetrashvili has been booked in Nizhny Novgorod.
Rubin Kazan push forward at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tambow defence.
In Nizhny Novgorod, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia of Rubin Kazan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Tambow's Georgi Melkadze breaks free at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Rubin Kazan make their first substitution with Zurab Davitashvili replacing Oliver Abildgaard.
Ball safe as Tambow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tambow's Vladimir Obukhov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Tambow are pushing forward but Georgi Melkadze's finish is wide of the goal.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Free kick Tambow.
Aleksandr Zuev (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Aleksei Eskov.
Tambow’s Georgi Melkadze is on his feet again at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Georgi Melkadze is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Soltmurad Bakaev is replacing Darko Jevtic for Rubin Kazan at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Throw-in for Tambow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Aleksei Eskov signals a throw-in for Tambow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Aleksei Eskov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In Nizhny Novgorod Tambow drive forward through Georgi Melkadze. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aleksei Eskov awards Tambow a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Aleksei Eskov signals a free kick to Tambow.
Tambow push forward at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium and Mikhail Kostyukov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rubin Kazan defence.
Corner awarded to Tambow.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Nizhny Novgorod.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nizhny Novgorod.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Throw-in Tambow.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Zurab Davitashvili for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tambow at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium.
Ivan Ignatyev (Rubin Kazan) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nizhny Novgorod.
The home team replace Vladimir Obukhov with Miguel Cardoso.
Leonid Slutskiy is making the team's third substitution at Nizhny Novgorod Stadium with Denis Makarov replacing Khvicha Kvaratskhelia.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
The home team have replaced Mikhail Kostyukov with Khasan Mamtov. This is the third substitution made today by Timur Shipshev.
Pavel Karasev is on a sub for Guram Tetrashvili for Tambow.
